remarks: Version of ~ bj-elisset with a dv condition on ` x , V ` .  This proof uses only ~ df-ex , ~ ax-gen , ~ ax-4 and ~ df-clel on top of propositional calculus.  Prefer its use over ~ bj-elisset when sufficient.  (Contributed by BJ, 14-Sep-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-elissetv $p |- ( A e. V -> E. x x = A ) $.
$d A x $.
$d V x $.
